products.name: Fischer Digital Air Fryer 4L FAF-401WD
products.short_description: Compact 4L digital air fryer with smart electronic controls, see-through window, and injection molding texture design.
products.description:
Fischer Digital Air Fryer 4L

A compact air fryer featuring smart electronic controls and a transparent window for monitoring cooking progress. Perfect for individuals and small families who want healthy, oil-free cooking.

Key Features

  • Smart electronic knob control
  • See-through window for easy monitoring
  • Wide temperature range: 80-200°C
  • Injection molding texture design
  • Compact 4L capacity
  • Non-stick coating

products.description:
Fischer Digital Air Fryer 6L

A versatile 6-liter capacity air fryer designed for household cooking with modern conveniences and quality construction. Features a metal cavity instead of plastic for reduced odor during cooking.

Key Features

  • Touch control panel for easy operation
  • Non-stick coating for easy cleaning
  • Elegant design with matt finish
  • Metal cavity to reduce smelling
  • Bottom heater for much even cooking result
  • Large see-through window for easy observation
  • Wide temperature range: 40-200°C

Fischer Digital Air Fryer 8L

High-capacity air fryer designed for family-size cooking with digital controls and multiple preset cooking functions. The 8-liter capacity ensures you can prepare meals for the entire family in a single batch.

Key Features

  • Digital touch control panel with 6 preset cooking functions
  • Non-stick coating for simplified cleaning
  • Large air frying basket suitable for family portions
  • 8-liter capacity
  • Dual heating element for even temperature control
  • Injection molding texture design

A reliable 1000-watt electric iron with steady grip design and precise temperature control for effortless ironing of all fabric types.

categories.name: Kitchen Hoods
categories.description: Premium built-in kitchen hoods with powerful airflow up to 1500 m³/h. Features include touch control, auto-clean, and energy-efficient BLDC motors.

categories.name: Kitchen Hobs
categories.description: Built-in kitchen hobs with tempered glass or stainless steel panels. Available in 3 to 5 burner configurations with brass burners and flame failure devices.

categories.name: Cooking Ranges
categories.description: Professional cooking ranges with 3 to 5 burners. Perfect for modern kitchens with complete brass burners and stainless steel finish.

categories.name: Oven Toasters
categories.description: Digital and mechanical oven toasters with capacities from 35L to 48L. Features include rotisserie function and convection heating.

categories.name: Air Fryers
categories.description: Digital air fryers with capacities from 4L to 8L for healthy oil-free cooking. Features dual heating elements for even temperature control.

categories.name: Water Coolers
categories.description: Commercial and industrial electric water coolers with capacities from 35L to 300L. Made with food-grade stainless steel.

categories.name: Slim Water Coolers
categories.description: Space-saving slim design water coolers perfect for compact spaces. Available in 35L, 45L, and 65L capacities.

categories.name: Storage Coolers
categories.description: Self-contained storage water coolers with large capacity from 25L to 1000L. Ideal for high-demand environments.

categories.name: Water Dispensers
categories.description: Compact water dispensers for home and office use. Features food-grade stainless steel tanks and eco-friendly refrigerants.

categories.name: Water Heaters
categories.description: Electric water heaters with Eco Watt technology for energy-efficient water heating. Various capacities available.

categories.name: Fast Electric Water Heaters
categories.description: Fast electric water heaters from 30 to 200 liters with adjustable wattage options and thermal safety cutouts.

categories.name: Instant Electric Water Heaters
categories.description: Instant cum storage electric water heaters from 10 to 60 liters with quick heating technology and compact design.

categories.name: Hybrid Geysers
categories.description: Hybrid water heaters with both electric and gas heating options for dual fuel flexibility. Capacities from 25 to 100 gallons.

categories.name: Accessories
categories.description: Kitchen and appliance accessories including basket liners, iron racks, and replacement parts.
